li.div: Raymond School District is dedicated to a child-centered learning environment expecting all students to learn and succeed. Even during this time of school closure, we uphold this mission and commit ourselves to providing an excellent learning experience for all of our students. Your homes are now an extension of our classrooms, and even though we are a distance apart, together, we will do our best to ensure our children continue to learn and grow.

div.p: Raymond School District is dedicated to providing a child-centered learning environment expecting all students to learn and succeed. We commit to providing and utilizing a progressive, relevant curriculum, encouraging all students to become responsible citizens prepared to meet the challenges of the future.

The Raymond School PTO is on a mission to support our young dreamers, and we need you on our team! Every penny goes directly to our students as we support their Ambition, Belief, and Character!
